title: Settings
description: Settings used to configure rakuyomi's behavior.

chapter_sorting_mode.description: The order in which chapters will be displayed in the chapter listing. Defaults to `volume_descending`.

languages.description: If set, only chapters translated to those languages will be shown.

source_lists.description: A list of URLs containing Aidoku-compatible source lists, which will be available for installation from inside the plugin.

storage_path.description: The path to the folder where downloaded chapters will be stored. If not set, the default downloads folder will be used.

storage_size_limit.description: The size of the storage used to store download chapters. Defaults to 2 GB. Should be in the format: [positive real number] [GB|MB].
